newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: POLL - PORTUGAL SPREADS VS BUNDS, SPANISH BONOS.
newsitem.headline: POLL - PORTUGAL SPREADS VS BUNDS, SPANISH BONOS.

text.p: The following is the daily forecast for spreads in the Portuguese bond market based on a poll of four banks and one brokerage.
Poll covers spreads between the February 2007 Portuguese cash bond (OT) and the German and Spanish equivalents, together with the spreads between the Portuguese 10 and two-year bonds.
Min spread Avge Max vs previous close
Key factors likely to affect market:

-Portugal will gain along with the rest of Europe after the Bundesbank left its repo rate at 3.0 percent. Some see room for a slight narrowing of the spread with the Bund. The curve could be flattened by the greater interest in the longer end and the impact of the 25 billion escudo, three-year bond auction by Portugal's Credit Institute on Tuesday.
